name: NewSubfileType
short_description: A general indication of the kind of data contained in this subfile.

name: SubfileType
short_description: A general indication of the kind of data contained in this subfile.

name: ImageWidth
short_description: The number of columns in the image, i.e., the number of pixels per row.

name: ImageLength
short_description: The number of rows of pixels in the image.

name: BitsPerSample
short_description: Number of bits per component.

name: Compression
short_description: Compression scheme used on the image data.

name: PhotometricInterpretation
short_description: The color space of the image data.

name: Threshholding
short_description: For black and white TIFF files that represent shades of gray, the technique used to convert from gray to black and white pixels.

name: CellWidth
short_description: The width of the dithering or halftoning matrix used to create a dithered or halftoned bilevel file.

name: CellLength
short_description: The length of the dithering or halftoning matrix used to create a dithered or halftoned bilevel file.

name: FillOrder
short_description: The logical order of bits within a byte.
default: 1 (lower column values in higher order bits)

name: ImageDescription
short_description: A string that describes the subject of the image.

name: Make
short_description: The scanner manufacturer.

name: Model
short_description: The scanner model name or number.

name: StripOffsets
short_description: For each strip, the byte offset of that strip.
count: N = StripsPerImage for PlanarConfiguration equal to 1; N = SamplesPerPixel * StripsPerImage for PlanarConfiguration equal to 2

name: Orientation
short_description: The orientation of the image with respect to the rows and columns.

name: SamplesPerPixel
short_description: The number of components per pixel.

name: RowsPerStrip
short_description: The number of rows per strip.

name: StripByteCounts
short_description: For each strip, the number of bytes in the strip after compression.
count: N = StripsPerImage for PlanarConfiguration equal to 1; N = SamplesPerPixel * StripsPerImage for PlanarConfiguration equal to 2

name: MinSampleValue
short_description: The minimum component value used.

name: MaxSampleValue
short_description: The maximum component value used.

name: XResolution
short_description: The number of pixels per ResolutionUnit in the ImageWidth direction.

name: YResolution
short_description: The number of pixels per ResolutionUnit in the ImageLength direction.

name: PlanarConfiguration
short_description: How the components of each pixel are stored.

name: FreeOffsets
short_description: For each string of contiguous unused bytes in a TIFF file, the byte offset of the string.

name: FreeByteCounts
short_description: For each string of contiguous unused bytes in a TIFF file, the number of bytes in the string.

name: GrayResponseUnit
short_description: The precision of the information contained in the GrayResponseCurve.

name: GrayResponseCurve
short_description: For grayscale data, the optical density of each possible pixel value.

name: ResolutionUnit
short_description: The unit of measurement for XResolution and YResolution.

name: Software
short_description: Name and version number of the software package(s) used to create the image.

name: DateTime
short_description: Date and time of image creation.

name: Artist
short_description: Person who created the image.

name: HostComputer
short_description: The computer and/or operating system in use at the time of image creation.

name: ColorMap
short_description: A color map for palette color images.

name: ExtraSamples
short_description: Description of extra components.

name: Copyright
short_description: Copyright notice.

name: DocumentName
short_description: The name of the.document from which this image was scanned.

name: PageName
short_description: The name of the page from which this image was scanned.

name: XPosition
short_description: X position of the image.

name: YPosition
short_description: Y position of the image.

name: T4Options
short_description: Options for Group 3 Fax compression

name: T6Options
short_description: Options for Group 4 Fax compression

name: PageNumber
short_description: The page number of the page from which this image was scanned.

name: TransferFunction
short_description: Describes a transfer function for the image in tabular style.
default: A single table corresponding to the NTSC standard gamma value of 2.2.

name: Predictor
short_description: A mathematical operator that is applied to the image data before an encoding scheme is applied.

name: WhitePoint
short_description: The chromaticity of the white point of the image.

name: PrimaryChromaticities
short_description: The chromaticities of the primaries of the image.

name: HalftoneHints
short_description: Conveys to the halftone function the range of gray levels within a colorimetrically-specified image that should retain tonal detail.

name: TileWidth
short_description: The tile width in pixels. This is the number of columns in each tile.

name: TileLength
short_description: The tile length (height) in pixels. This is the number of rows in each tile.

name: TileOffsets
short_description: For each tile, the byte offset of that tile, as compressed and stored on disk.
count: N = TilesPerImage for PlanarConfiguration = 1;  N = SamplesPerPixel * TilesPerImage for PlanarConfiguration = 2

name: TileByteCounts
short_description: For each tile, the number of (compressed) bytes in that tile.
count: N = TilesPerImage for PlanarConfiguration = 1;  N = SamplesPerPixel * TilesPerImage for PlanarConfiguration = 2

name: BadFaxLines
short_description: Used in the TIFF-F standard, denotes the number of 'bad' scan lines encountered by the facsimile device.

name: CleanFaxData
short_description: Used in the TIFF-F standard, indicates if 'bad' lines encountered during reception are stored in the data, or if 'bad' lines have been replaced by the receiver.

name: ConsecutiveBadFaxLines
short_description: Used in the TIFF-F standard, denotes the maximum number of consecutive 'bad' scanlines received.

name: SubIFDs
short_description: Offset to child IFDs.

name: InkSet
short_description: The set of inks used in a separated (PhotometricInterpretation=5) image.

name: InkNames
short_description: The name of each ink used in a separated image.
count: N = total number of characters in all the ink name strings, including the NULs

name: NumberOfInks
short_description: The number of inks.

name: DotRange
short_description: The component values that correspond to a 0% dot and 100% dot.

name: TargetPrinter
short_description: A description of the printing environment for which this separation is intended.

name: SampleFormat
short_description: Specifies how to interpret each data sample in a pixel.

name: SMinSampleValue
short_description: Specifies the minimum sample value.
c_type: BYTE or SHORT or LONG or RATIONAL or DOUBLE
default: The minimum of the data type.

name: SMaxSampleValue
short_description: Specifies the maximum sample value.
c_type: BYTE or SHORT or LONG or RATIONAL or DOUBLE
default: The maximum of the data type.

name: TransferRange
short_description: Expands the range of the TransferFunction.

name: ClipPath
short_description: Mirrors the essentials of PostScript's path creation functionality.

name: XClipPathUnits
short_description: The number of units that span the width of the image, in terms of integer ClipPath coordinates.

name: YClipPathUnits
short_description: The number of units that span the height of the image, in terms of integer ClipPath coordinates.

name: Indexed
short_description: Aims to broaden the support for indexed images to include support for any color space.

name: JPEGTables
short_description: JPEG quantization and/or Huffman tables.
count: N = number of bytes in tables datastream

name: OPIProxy
short_description: OPI-related.

name: GlobalParametersIFD
short_description: Used in the TIFF-FX standard to point to an IFD containing tags that are globally applicable to the complete TIFF file.

name: ProfileType
short_description: Used in the TIFF-FX standard, denotes the type of data stored in this file or IFD.

name: FaxProfile
short_description: Used in the TIFF-FX standard, denotes the 'profile' that applies to this file.

name: CodingMethods
short_description: Used in the TIFF-FX standard, indicates which coding methods are used in the file.

name: VersionYear
short_description: Used in the TIFF-FX standard, denotes the year of the standard specified by the FaxProfile field.

name: ModeNumber
short_description: Used in the TIFF-FX standard, denotes the mode of the standard specified by the FaxProfile field.

name: Decode
short_description: Used in the TIFF-F and TIFF-FX standards, holds information about the ITULAB (PhotometricInterpretation = 10) encoding.

name: DefaultImageColor
short_description: Defined in the Mixed Raster Content part of RFC 2301, is the default color needed in areas where no image is available.
default: For the Foreground layer image, the default value is black. For other cases, including the Background layer image, the default value is white.

name: JPEGProc
short_description: Old-style JPEG compression field. TechNote2 invalidates this part of the specification.
default: None according to specification, though we do recommend using 1 (baseline sequential) as a default in readers

name: JPEGInterchangeFormat
short_description: Old-style JPEG compression field. TechNote2 invalidates this part of the specification.

name: JPEGInterchangeFormatLength
short_description: Old-style JPEG compression field. TechNote2 invalidates this part of the specification.

name: JPEGRestartInterval
short_description: Old-style JPEG compression field. TechNote2 invalidates this part of the specification.

name: JPEGLosslessPredictors
short_description: Old-style JPEG compression field. TechNote2 invalidates this part of the specification.

name: JPEGPointTransforms
short_description: Old-style JPEG compression field. TechNote2 invalidates this part of the specification.

name: JPEGQTables
short_description: Old-style JPEG compression field. TechNote2 invalidates this part of the specification.

name: JPEGDCTables
short_description: Old-style JPEG compression field. TechNote2 invalidates this part of the specification.

name: JPEGACTables
short_description: Old-style JPEG compression field. TechNote2 invalidates this part of the specification.

name: YCbCrCoefficients
short_description: The transformation from RGB to YCbCr image data.

name: YCbCrSubSampling
short_description: Specifies the subsampling factors used for the chrominance components of a YCbCr image.

name: YCbCrPositioning
short_description: Specifies the positioning of subsampled chrominance components relative to luminance samples.

name: ReferenceBlackWhite
short_description: Specifies a pair of headroom and footroom image data values (codes) for each pixel component.

name: StripRowCounts
short_description: Defined in the Mixed Raster Content part of RFC 2301, used to replace RowsPerStrip for IFDs with variable-sized strips.

name: XMP
short_description: XML packet containing XMP metadata

name: ImageID
short_description: OPI-related.

name: ImageLayer
short_description: Defined in the Mixed Raster Content part of RFC 2301, used to denote the particular function of this Image in the mixed raster scheme.
